inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has multiple myeloma, s/p allogeneic transplant with recurrent disease and with systemic amyloidosis

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Presence of measurable disease (secretory multiple myeloma or oligosecretory or nonsecretory multiple myeloma)

inclusion.criterion: aspartate aminotransferase (AST) <= 2.5 times the upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: alanine aminotransferase (ALT) <= 2.5 times the upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: smoldering multiple myeloma or monoclonal gammopathy of undetermined significance (MGUS)
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Waldenström's disease or other conditions in which IgM M-protein is present in the absence of a clonal plasma cell infiltration with lytic bone lesions
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior or current systemic therapy for multiple myeloma including steroids (with exception of emergency use of a short course [maximum 4 days] of steroids before randomization or of prior or current use of bisphosphonates)
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Patient was treated with melphalan and prednisone, followed by VAD regimen, and autologous stem cell transplant

exclusion.criterion: Radiation therapy within 30 days before enrollment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Major surgery within 30 days before enrollment (Kyphoplasty is not considered major surgery)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Peripheral neuropathy or neuropathic pain Grade 2 or higher, as defined by National Cancer Institute Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (NCI CTCAE), Version
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multiple comorbid conditions that may impact tolerability of high-dose chemotherapy with stem cell transplantation.
